Text: Again thanks a lot Claudia for this episode.I appreciate it a lot..Here were i live they play only "The bold and the beautiful" older episodes than yours and no at all "Days of are Lives".My two favorites soap especialy Days..Its very cool that we have the latest episodes and both the 2 soaps.The only thing that is missing is that we don't have subtitles.But i think that is impossible to have.?

Thanks for your words. As always, it's my pleasure to help you all to have our beloved soaps every day. I'm afraid I can't add subtitles to my videos by now, but maybe someone could help us all with that...? Anyway, as I said, thanks for being there and just enjoy!
You are truly amazing, ClaudiaZ! My favourite uploader. I don't know what i would do without you. I live outside USA and i dont get to watch soaps on tv, keep up the good work!!!!
